hired classes, strongest to weakest, no prob.

strongest to weakest in a normal solo situation:
soldier
archer/mage tie
cleric
thief
druid
elf
skeleton
fire elemental
orc
ghost
fairy/slime tie

strongest to weakest, all things in their favor, solo:
soldier
archer/mage/cleric tie
elf
druid
thief
orc
skeleton
fire elemental
fairy
ghost
slime

strongest to weakest teammate:
cleric
mage
druid
soldier
archer
fairy
orc
thief
fire elemental
skeleton
elf
slime
ghost

not totally sure about the teammate part, but almost totally for the 
solo stuff.

Oldschool
